jeus.management.j2ee
Interface ResourceAdapterModuleMBean

All Superinterfaces:
J2EEDeployedObjectMBean, J2EEManagedObjectMBean, J2EEModuleMBean
public interface ResourceAdapterModuleMBean
extends J2EEModuleMBean

identifies a deployed resource adapter archieve(RAR) provides JCAWorkManagerStatsImpl information, if configured
